data.message: If this ends up being a remix to Ozzy's "Walk on Water" this shits onnnn...like in "Going through Changes"...

replies.message: I'm immediately unliking him if there are anymore sample bullshit. Be original. Use your own beats!!

I understand your point. But it's been pretty well publicized that Dre has been collaborating with the whole project, so I'm sure well get plenty of fresh awesome ones! But I think those he has sampled over the last few years have been intended to be songs to sort of lighten the mood, as it were.
